data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Engel, Michael S., Falin, Zachary H., Batelka, Jan (2019): A new genus of Pelecotominae from Mexico, with notes on the genera Clinops and Scotoscopus and the description of new species (Coleoptera, Ripiphoridae). ZooKeys 857: 59-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.857.34938, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.857.34938
